entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
